name: Layer One X
description: Layer One X (L1X) is a fourth-generation decentralized platform designed to make interoperability between blockchains seamless and efficient. It allows developers to create new multi-chain applications or extend existing ones with cross-chain capabilities. It provides interoperability across evm and altvm networks. As of January 2025, there are 160 decentralised full validator nodes with over 2M+ Transactions.
